Package com.zendesk.sdk.ui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KeyboardSearchListener.Searchable
    Interface which components will implement that require search ability on pressing the enter key.
    ListRowView<T>
    ListRowView is an interface to allow for the generic definition of a behaviour for List View elements
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimationListenerAdapter
    Adapter class with empty implementations for methods defined in Animation.AnimationListener
    KeyboardSearchListener
    This class implements Listeners for searching for both software and hardware keyboards.
    NetworkAwareActionbarActivity
    This activity can be used when you need to be notified of whether the network is available or not.
    TextWatcherAdapter
    Adapts a TextWatcher
    ZendeskDialog
    Common functionality for all Zendesk SDK dialogs.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LoadingState
    This enum represents loading states that our UI elements can be in.
    ZendeskPicassoTransformationFactory
